titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Bahamas
Bahamas

div.head: Legislation
div.p: In general, documents are available for research 30 years after creation. For documents under 30 years of age, researchers may apply to the relevant ministry for permission to access them.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Goodman's Bay Corporate Centre, West Bay Street, P.O. Box N 3746, Nassau.
National Archives: The Director, Department of Archives, Mackey and Shirley Streets, P.O. Box SS-6341, Nassau, N.P.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers must acquire a research identification card at the security desk of the National Archives. There are finding aids in the Research room.
